attributes.action: Council Housing, We have it but yet we still have homeless people
attributes.additional_details: Homeless people should be put in council houses with financial support because we all deserve a right to live a happy life.
attributes.background: I would like everyone in society to be treated the same, so what if they have done drugs or messed up their life’s. At the end of the day we’re all human, we all deserve a second chance to put things right.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require housing for all homeless people after the coronavirus crisis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860
